markings: Verso, top left of stretcher: paper label giving family genealogy: 1770 Catherine Fuller Potter 1848 / (from Beaufort, S.C.) / Granddaughter of Margaret Graham, daughter of Wlater Graham / of Gartur, descendant of Malise Graham, 1st Earl of Monteith, / and Thomas Stewart of Ballymoran, County Down, Ireland / Married John Potter, son of James Potter of Mount Potter, and Catherine / daughter of Sir John Stewart of Ballymoran, County Down, Ireland / Their son James married Sarah Jones Grimes / Their son John married Alice Beirn Steenberger / Their son James married Elizabeth Perkins Sturgis / Their son Robert Sturgis married Dorothy Tweedy / (Sully catalogue 1408).;
